## ProtocolReceipt type

One of either a [PendingReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-base.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, a [FailedReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-base.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-base.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type ProtocolReceipt<R = unknown, D = unknown> = PendingReceipt | MinedReceipt<R, D>;
```
**References:** [PendingReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-base.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [MinedReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-base.minedreceipt.md)
